title: Nice Sanctuary
review: Sonandi wildlife sanctuary is an undisturbed wildlife heaven.The sanctuary is dotted with forests  Sal,Sheesham and Bamboo.Asiatic elephants,Tigers and Migratory mammals species are the main dweller and highlight of this sanctuary.

title: Nature lovers!
review: I just loved this wild life sanctuary as there are many types and species of birds can be seen. also many animals can be seen.

title: Excellent place for friends get together.
review: We 11 friends,  reached the place on 12th.Jan. Very calm and beautiful jungle. Main habitat for elephants. There are two room blocks, one was constructed in the year 1892 and other was built in 2005, very neat and clean rooms,  excellent garden area. We walked down to the river from the site which was only 150 meters. Really enjoyed a lot. Good dinning hall.

title: Rathuadab
review: This cenctury is exterior of Corbett Tiger Reserve - you will get to see many birds, animals specially elephants, deers, leopards etc.

title: nice jungle
review: moved around on elephant. good experience of jungle. saw some wild animals also. crossing river on elephant back was adventureous.

title: quite and peacefull
review: low tourist inflow make it a very quite and serene .. dont expect to see all the animals .. come here stay longer and relax...

title: Peaceful and near nature
review: In case you want to stay away and in peaceful surroundings than visit this place for peaceful jungle environment. There is river flowing in the mid of the jungle. No mobile connectivity. You have to book accommodation online. Best time to visit is Nov- Mar. Not very many tourists stay and visit this site.

title: Not good
review: Not many animals to be seen..plus you have to walk, rather climb a lot. You cant go in your own vehicle, you must take their jeep.

title: Beautiful
review: This sanctuary is a part of corbett tiger reserve .Visit  was amazing and staff was very friendly and supportive & you can spot many birds, dears and elephants.Paradise for nature lovers as  middle in the dense forest with no electricity & no mobile signals

title: Jungle is open for nature lovers
review: An amazing and beautiful natural place for nature place, I love this place. After a dense forest area suddenly a huge open area came with magnificence view.

title: Average
review: This Sonanadi Wildlife Sanctuary is named after the Sonanadi River which is passing through nearby. This Sonanadi Wildlife Sanctuary is part of the Jim Corbett Tiger Reserve, alongwith the Jim Corbett National Park.

title: not impressed at all
review: We couldn't see many animals  . They said people wait for a few hours to catch glimpse  of the wild animals. Frankly, i didn't particularly want to spend my time waiting. So, i didn't enjoy the place at all. Additionally. we had to walk a very tiresome path. I definitely didn't feel it was worth it.

title: Amazing Adventureous Destination !!
review: We four couple recently visited that awesome destination....We have booked 2 FRH there in Corbbet Mudia Pani & Halduparao.....Me & My Brother have statyed there at Halduparao...it was a great place middle in the dense forest with electric fencing beside the sonanadi river....No electricity, No mobile signals...give a different experience to that place....only a single solar bulb was there in rooms & bathrooms....we enjoyed that, one cook & one armed forest guard was provided to us during our stay.......to find the entry gate of these FRH was a challenge....so be remember that you have to come Kotdwar then move towards Lansdown and after reaching a place named Duggada you have to search the Badan Vasa Gate of Sona Nadi wildlife Sanctury........Badan Vasa Gate of Sona Nadi wildlife Sanctury is your destination...

title: Finest forest rest house
review: In halduparao we stayed two nights it was amazing and adventures staff was very friendly and supportive we lots of birds spotted dears sambar fox and elephants it's amazing place to stay. But few things to remember specially how to reach because we had hard time to reach there so I wanna share with every body how to reach you have to go from kotdwara to siddhbali temple to duggata to vatan vasa and vatan vasa it's a main entrance to sonanadi wild life sanctuary then halduparao it's 9km away from vatan vasa so please don't get confuse thank you

title: Amazing attraction...!!!
review: It is one of the most preferred tourist spot in nainital, it is totally worthy to have a visit here, its really amazing to see such wildlife sanctuary in a high altitude, the sanctuary hosts many rare floats and fauna, it is better to have a tourist guide while visiting this sanctuary, children will really enjoy at this sanctuary, it is quite restricted, baring our safety, overall it's a wonderful place to have a visit...!!!

title: car for forest entry
review: based on your information I wanted to check whether we can take our SUV inside sonanadi for staying in Haldu parao.I came to understand that no outside vehicles are permitted .Only the Gypsy cars are allowed having permits from Ramnagar ,I checked with some of the travel agents in Kotdwar nearest to Vatanvasa gate they also confirmed the same .I contacted some of the tour operators they are suggesting entry from Mohann. Any body can guide me?

title: Please help
review: Which is the the best frh in Sonanadi wildlife sanctuary is there any electricity or water tank in forest rest house like Halduparao,rathuadhab,sindikhal etc& cn i take my own suv inside the park fr nightstay..?

title: sonanadi sanctuary
review: sonanadi-wildlife-sanctuary Sonanadi Wildlife Sanctuary, situated in the neighborhood of Corbett National Park, lies in the Nainital district of Uttrakhand. Being shielded from the excessive attention of tourists, Sonanadi National Park is a quiet and peaceful sanctuary located at the riverside of Sonanadi and amidst the virgin forests that serve as home to a large variety of fauna and flora.

title: well made Zoo
review: the zoo is very well made in the natural surroundings

title: Hadipurao Sonanadi Wildlife Sanctuary
review: The co ordinates for GMAP are 29°39'05.2"N 78°44'17.9"E . Contrary to many comments in finding difficulty the way to Haldipurao FRH I found it quite easy. On road it can be reached straight via Kotdwar , Lansdown , Sendhikhal (take diversion at bridge on left) to Vatan Vasa. You do not get a 4WD here easily and should be hired from Sendhikhal . 2WD is a risky on hilly terrain. Wonderful place for nature lover and remember at FRH power is a scanty and it is absolute dark after 8 pm till 6 am. I was there with my wife & son and enjoyed the entire stay. Deers, rein deers, elephants, birds are common. Tiger sighting a luck and we could only realize that one had followed us while getting back from river side. The paw spotted was on wheel tracks and the beast had walked a bit before vanishing into jungle. We were able to hear it's roaring.  FRH is a strict vegetarian and cook knows magic how to make lip licking stuffs.

title: Beautiful Nature Park
review: Situated close to Jim Corbett National Park, this is aquiet and peaceful sanctuary located at the riverside of Sonanadi. Can easily be reached via road and is definitely recommended.
